head.title: Lauck to Compete In June 10 Event

series.series.name: PLUS: ROAD RACING -- NEW YORK MINI MARATHON

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Fashion, Beauty and Fitness

hedline.hl1: Lauck to Compete In June 10 Event

abstract.p: Anne-Marie Lauck says that she will run 29th New York Mini Marathon on June 10 in order to put some distance between her recent disappointment and get back on track for Syndey Olympic Games in September (S)

block.p: Anne-Marie Lauck said yesterday that she would run the 29th New York Mini Marathon on June 10 in order to put some distance between her recent disappointment and get back on track for the Sydney Olympic Games in September.

Anne-Marie Lauck said yesterday that she would run the 29th New York Mini Marathon on June 10 in order to put some distance between her recent disappointment and get back on track for the Sydney Olympic Games in September.

Lauck finished third in the women's Olympic marathon trials last February and under a byzantine rules structure failed to qualify for the Sydney Marathon. At a news conference in Manhattan yesterday to announce the minimarathon, Lauck said she still hoped to make the United States Olympic team in the 10,000 meters. The trials for that event will be July 14 in Sacramento, Calif.
PLUS: ROAD RACING -- NEW YORK MINI MARATHON
